byline.contributor: Alan Blinder reported from North Charleston, and Manny Fernandez from Houston. Frances Robles contributed reporting from North Charleston.
byline.original: By ALAN BLINDER and MANNY FERNANDEZ

abstract: North Charleston, SC, prepares for weekend of funeral services for Walter L Scott, unarmed black man shot in back and killed by white Police Officer Michael T Slager, who has been charged with murder; working-class city expects angry public protests along with memorial services as state and federal officials continue to investigate shooting.
lead_paragraph: A funeral is set for Saturday as the Rev. Al Sharpton plans to come to town Sunday, and a local official made comments critical of the protesters.

headline.main: North Charleston Prepares for Mourning and Protest in Walter Scott Shooting
headline.print_headline: North Charleston Set for Weekend of Mourning and Protest

snippet: A funeral is set for Saturday as the Rev. Al Sharpton plans to come to town Sunday, and a local official made comments critical of the protesters.
